Combine the tomatoes, cucumber, onion, feta cheese and olives in a salad bowel.
Season and add the dill and mint.
For the dressing, mix the evoo, red wine vinegar and oregano.
Pour over salad and mix well.
Serve with crusty bread.
Im also serving it with lamb kebabs.

445475.title: Garlicky Greek Salad
ingredient_list: 1/3 cup Kalamata olives, pitted and chopped
instruction_list: Whisk oil, vinegar, parsley, oregano, and garlic in a small bowl.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Place tomatoes, onions, and cucumber on a platter.
Pour dressing over salad.
Let marinate for at least 20 minutes.
Sprinkle salad with cheese and Kalamata olives.

177663.title: Strawberry Mint Shortcake Salad with Whipped Greek Yogurt and Toasted Angel Food Croutons
ingredient_list: 2 pounds Fresh Strawberries, Washed, Stemmed And Quartered Lengthwise
4 ounces, weight Nonfat Plain Greek Yogurt
3 slices (1/2" Thick Slices) Angel Food Cake, Cut Into 1/2" Cubes
instruction_list: For the salad: Toss strawberries and mint together in a large bowl.
In a smaller bowl, using a mixer, whip whipping cream until stiff peaks form (tip: use a cold metal bowl and cold beaters).
Mix in Greek yogurt and honey until combined.
Spoon yogurt mixture over strawberries and mint and fold to coat.
Cover bowl and place in the refrigerator for 30 minutes prior to serving.
For the croutons: Preheat oven to 350 F. Place angel food cake cubes onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 7-8 minutes, flipping halfway through cooking.
Remove from oven and allow to cool for 10 minutes prior to serving on top of salad!
To serve: Spoon about 1 cup of strawberry salad into a bowl and top with 1/4 cup croutons.
Enjoy!
Nutrition Info per 1 salad: 147 calories, 6 g fat, 4 g protein, 18 g carbohydrates, 3 g fiber

1024067.title: Another Greek Rice Salad
ingredient_list: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh herb (I prefer oregano)
instruction_list: Mix rice while still warm with vinaigrette.
Let chill.
Poach raisins in vermouth until puffed and most of vermouth is absorbed.
Chill.
Add nuts and herbs, mix together and chill again.

114239.title: Cajun Greek Salad Recipe
ingredient_list: boneless skinless chicken breast halves in pcs Cajun seasoning lettuce other veggies and olive as desired feta cheese
instruction_list: One of our favorite salad dinners is Greek salad with Cajun chicken.
Sounds weird but we had it at a restaurant and loved it.
We take chicken breast and slice into small strips.
Sprinkle on Cajun seasoning (salt free for us).
Then stir-fry in a skillet sprayed with Pam.
Put this on top of the Greek salad (feta cheese is a must).
If we are really organized we make some toasted garlic bread with a little Parmesan cheese.
Yummy!

711689.title: Greek Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 8 oz. wagon-wheel or other medium-size cut pasta
instruction_list: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Add broccoli to pot 2 to 3 minutes before pasta is done.
Drain in colander.
Rinse under running cold water and drain well.
Put in a large serving bowl, stir in dressing, then remaining ingredients and toss to mix and coat.
It doesn't get much easier.
The pasta and broccoli cook in one pot.

445451.title: Greek Yogurt Chicken Salad
ingredient_list: 1 pound Chicken Breasts, Boneless And Skinless
Chicken Broth Or Water, Enough To Cover Chicken In The Pan
instruction_list: Start by cooking the chicken breasts.
I like boiling them in chicken broth or stock, but feel free to boil in water, too.
Boiling the chicken in broth, however, will give it significantly more flavor.
Bring the chicken broth/stock to a boil and add the whole chicken breasts.
Cook until no pink remains.
Depending on the size of the chicken breasts, this could take anywhere from 15 20 minutes.
While the chicken is boiling, put together your sauce.
Whisk together Greek yogurt, Dijon mustard and garlic powder in a medium-sized bowl until well mixed.
Add salt and pepper, to taste.
Next, stir in dried cranberries or raisins and cashews.
If youre worried about the cashews getting too soft, you could add them right before serving!
After the chicken is done boiling, remove it from the water/broth.
I like to let it rest for about 5 minutes.
This ensures that the juice stays in the chicken instead of spilling out when you cut it!
Dice up the chicken and mix it into the sauce.
You can either serve this immediately, or place in the refrigerator for up to 4 days!

883910.title: Greek Yoghurt and Fruit Salad
ingredient_list: 200 g Greek yogurt, 8 oz (FAGE brand is available overseas, you can get a variety of fat contents, they are all delicious or y)
fresh fruit salad, of your choice (try to use a variety of fresh, seasonal fruit, cut into little pieces)
2 tablespoons honey (regular honey can be used, but Greek Thyme Honey is awesome)
instruction_list: In a parfait or sundae glass, layer some fruit salad, top with 1/2 of the yoghurt per serving, and layer more fruit on top.
Drizzle with 1 tblsp honey per serving (or to taste), sprinkle with 2 tblsps of walnut pieces per serving and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
Enjoy!

867028.title: Grilled Greek Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 12 Baby Red And Yellow Potatoes (approximately 2 Pounds)
instruction_list: Put the potatoes in a large pot, cover with 3-4 inches of cold water.
Bring to a boil and cook until a small knife inserted into the center of the potato meets with some resistance, about 3 minutes.
Then add the green beans to the pot as well, and cook another 5-7 minutes.
Drain the water off.
Cool the beans slightly and chop in halves or thirds.
Set aside.
Let potatoes cool slightly and then cut them in half lengthwise.
Heat the grill to medium heat.
Toss the potatoes with a couple splashes of canola oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Grill potatoes until golden brown on the cut side of the potato.
Combine the grilled potatoes and the green beans in a bowl.
Toss with the vinaigrette, taste and season with salt and pepper if necessary.
Add crumbled feta cheese, and toss again.
Serve warm.

317580.title: Strawberry Bacon Salad with Greek Yogurt Poppyseed Dressing
ingredient_list: 1 whole Head Romaine Lettuce, Or 8 Cups Baby Spinach
8 slices Hickory Smoked Bacon, Cooked And Crumbled
instruction_list: Tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces, wash, dry and pour into a large bowl.
Top with strawberries, almonds and cooked bacon.
To make the dressing, pour all ingredients into a small bowl and whisk.
Drizzle salad generously and serve immediately.

588481.title: 7 layer Greek salad
instruction_list: Rinse and cut the romaine lettuce and put in a salad bowl
Add tiny frozen peas after boiling them for ten minutes
Add the sliced red onions on top of the tiny peas and romaine lettuce
Sprinkle shredded italian and mild chedder cheese on top
Spread the duke mayo on top of the salad ingredients in the bowl
Sprinkle grated parmesan on top of the mayo
Cut the tomatos and boiled eggs into halfs and decorate the top of the salad with these halfs

763067.title: Wilted Greek Salad with Caramelized Walnuts
ingredient_list: 2 lbs. baby spinach or regular spinach, stemmed
instruction_list: Rinse spinach, then pat leaves thoroughly dry with paper towels.
Tear into large pieces and dry again.
In nonstick wok or large pot, heat 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat.
Add asafetida if desired and cook until fragrant, stirring often, about 30 seconds.
Add half the spinach and toss until wilted, 30 to 60 seconds.
Immediately transfer to large bowl.
Repeat with remaining 1 tablespoon oil and spinach; add to bowl with wilted spinach.
Add lemon juice and season with salt and freshly ground pepper to taste.
Toss well.
Divide spinach mixture among plates.
Sprinkle each with some feta and walnuts and serve at once.

503470.title: Simple Greek Beet Salad
instruction_list: Boil the beets with their skins for about 30 to 40 minutes, let them cool and peel (this can get messy).
In a little bowl mix the olive oil, vinegar and garlic.
Cut the beets in round slices and place on a plate.
Pour the dressing over the beets and sprinkle with the walnuts.
*You can also cut in cubes and serve in a deeper bowl.

323703.title: Greek Salad Dressing
ingredient_list: One 0.7-ounce package Good Seasons Italian Salad Dressing Mix
instruction_list: Whisk together the vinegar, water, dressing mix, and anchovy paste.
Add the oil and whisk until blended.

977556.title: Greek Isle-Style Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 1/2 cup KRAFT Mayo with Olive Oil Reduced Fat Mayonnaise
2 lb. red potatoes (about 8), cubed, cooked and cooled King Sooper's 5 lb For $1.88 thru 02/09
1 pkg. (3.5 oz.) ATHENOS Crumbled Reduced Fat Feta Cheese
1/4 cup loosely packed torn mint leaves
instruction_list: Mix mayo and lemon juice in large bowl.
Add potatoes, cucumbers and cheese; mix lightly.
Refrigerate 3 hours or until chilled.
Stir in mint just before serving.

665240.title: Greek Garden Salad
ingredient_list: 12 cup crumbled feta cheese or 12 cup blue cheese
instruction_list: In a bowl combine the first seven ingredients.
Just before serving, add salad dressing and oregeno; toss to coat.
Serve in a lettuce lined bowl if desired.

587932.title: Horiatiki Salata: Greek Salad
ingredient_list: 14 lb sliced Greek feta cheese or 14 lb crumbled Greek feta cheese
olive oil, top quality extra virgin (quantity of your choice)
1 dozen Greek olive (Kalamata, green Cretan olives, etc.)
instruction_list: Wash and dry the tomatoes, cucumber, and green pepper.
Clean off the outer skin from the onion, wash, and dry.
Cut the tomatoes into bite-sized irregularly shaped chunks, removing the core.
Salt lightly.
Slice the cucumber into 1/4-inch slices, cutting slices in half (whether or not you peel the cucumber is a personal choice).
Salt lightly.
Slice the pepper into rings, removing the stem and seeds.
Salt lightly.
Slice the onion into thin rings.
Combine the tomatoes, cucumbers, green pepper and onion in a large salad bowl.
Sprinkle with oregano, pour olive oil over the salad, and toss.
Just before serving, place the feta on top of the salad, either as a slice or crumbled (as in photo), and toss in some olives.
Sprinkle the cheese with oregano (and pepper if desired), mix the oil and water and drizzle over the top, and serve, garnished with hot peppers.

212191.title: Greek Tofu Salad
ingredient_list: 3 Tablespoons Fat Free Or Low Fat Feta Cheese
instruction_list: In a medium bowl combine feta, onion, olives, olive oil, lemon juice and oregano.
Mix well.
Add crumbled tofu and mix with a fork.
Mash in.
Add cucumbers, tomatoes and parsley and mix.
Cover and refrigerate for 10 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve cold.

340182.title: Best Ever Greek Salad
ingredient_list: 3 -4 black olives, quartered (or any other variation) or 3 -4 green olives (or any other variation)
2 -3 tablespoons italian creamy garlic dressing (i use maries)
instruction_list: tear lettuce into small bite size squares and lay on plate.
add ingredients 2-6.
now add dressing by the tablespoon and toss until desired coat.
eat as a salad or stuff into a pita.

399207.title: " Chic" Greek Salad
ingredient_list: 1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1 (15 ounce) can water-packed artichoke hearts, drained
kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper
2 (6 ounce) cans tuna in vegetable oil, drained
instruction_list: Arrange the cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, red pepper, artichoke hearts and parsley on a platter.
Squeeze the lemon juice over the platter.
Season with salt and pepper.
Place shallots, vinegar and oregano in a bowl and let stand for 5 minutes.
Whisk in olive oil in a slow stream.
Pour dressing over salad.
Garnish salad with chunks of tuna, pepperoncini peppers and olives.

86986.title: Greek Salad
ingredient_list: 1/2 cups Roma Or Plum Tomato, Seeded And Chopped
1 dash Each Of Salt And Pepper
instruction_list: Step 1: Cut the cucumber down the middle, lengthwise.
Cut each half into two.
Chop cucumber, roughly the same size as the other vegetables.
Step 2: Add the cucumber, tomato, red onion, celery, red pepper and feta into a large bowl.
Mix.
Step 3: To make the vinaigrette, in a jar with a lid, add the olive oil, lemon juice and oregano.
Season with salt and pepper.
Shake before pouring onto the salad.
Step 4: Mix the dressing and the salad together.
Serve.

924587.title: Greek Couscous Salad
ingredient_list: 2 tablespoons all purpose Greek seasoning (I use Cavendars)
1 cup grape tomatoes, cut in half
12 kalamata olive, pitted & cut in half
instruction_list: Mix the first 3 ingredients together in a large bowl, Place to the side.
Slice zucchini into strips lengthwise and red onion into large rings (both about a centimeter thick).
Heat a grill pan to very hot and grill the red pepper (whole), onion rings and zucchini strips.
Remove the onion and zucchini when they begin to blacken slightly on the outsides - do no over cook!
Continue charring the red pepper until the outside skin is completely black.
(This can also be done outside on your BBQ).
While still slightly hot, chop the zucchini and the onion into 1/2 inch pieces and add to the vinegar.
Place the red pepper in a paper bag and allow the steam loosen the skin.
After a couple of minutes, remove the peel and the seeds.
Chop the pepper into 1/2 inch pieces and add to the vinegar.
Toss the grilled veggies in the vinegar dressing and cover the bowl with plastic plastic wrap (to trap the remaining steam inside).
Cook the couscous according to the manufacturer using the chicken stock.
I have provided the measurements for a "quick cooking" couscous, you may need to add more/less liquid according to the brand you use.
After cooking, fluff the couscous with a fork and add to the bowl with the grilled veggies and vinegar dressing.
Add the cheese, tomatoes and olives.
Toss to incorporate all ingredients well.
Chill.
This recipe can be made a day in advance.
Lightly toss the salad before serving to give it a light texture.

236300.title: Greek Salad
ingredient_list: 1/2 whole Small Red Onion, Thinly Sliced
1 pint Cherry Tomatoes, Halved If Desired
1/2 cups Pitted Greek Kalamata Olives, Or To Taste
instruction_list: Place all ingredients for dressing in the bowl of your food processor or in a blender.
Process for 1 to 2 minutes to emulsify.
Set aside.
For the salad, place chopped bell pepper, onion, cucumber, tomatoes, and Greek olives in a large airtight container.
Pour dressing over and mix well.
Place cover on container and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
When ready to serve, chop the iceberg and romaine lettuce, rinse and drain, and place in a serving dish.
Spoon the marinated vegetables over the lettuce, spooning some of the excess dressing over the top.
Sprinkle with crumbled feta cheese.

529386.title: Greek Chopped Salad
ingredient_list: 2 whole Roma Tomatoes Seeded And Chopped
1/4 cups Kalamata Olives, Pitted And Chopped
2 Tablespoons Fresh Basil, Sliced Into Thin Ribbons
1 whole Lemon, Juiced, Or More As Needed
1/4 teaspoons Freshly Ground Pepper, Or To Taste
instruction_list: Combine spelt and water in medium sauce pan and bring to a boil.
Cover and reduce heat to maintain a slow simmer for about 1 hour.
Spelt is done when its tender with a slight chewiness.
Rinse spelt with cool water and drain.
Combine spelt, tomatoes, bell pepper, cucumber, green onions, feta, olives and basil in a large mixing bowl.
For the dressing, in a small mixing bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper.
Pour over spelt salad and toss to combine.
Taste and adjust seasonings until you feel happy.
Serve on a bed of spinach or lettuce.
Notes: 1.
Have you tried spelt before?
I picked it out as part of last months Culinary Adventure and Im so glad I discovered this ancient grain.
Here are some highlights: it provides a complete protein, is high in vitamins, complex carbs and fiber.
My favorite thing about spelt is its delightful hearty texture with a crisp snap when you chew them.
Spelt can be substituted for any number of ingredients: brown rice, orzo pasta, quinoa, barley or any other healthy grain that you have on hand.
If you substitute, just follow the packages cooking instructions.
Before juicing the lemons, pop them in the microwave for 15-20 seconds and then roll them with your palm against the countertop.
This will make them easier to juice.
All lemons are not created equal.
Some are way juicier than others so buy 2 for this recipe.
Start with the juice of 1 lemon and adjust the amount to your liking.

668988.title: Kerry's Greek Salad
ingredient_list: 1 (14 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
1 medium red pepper, seeded and chopped
instruction_list: Mix, stir, chill, enjoy!
I just add the red wine vinegar and olive oil until I think it looks like enough.
You will have to decide that for yourself!

485551.title: Zee Ultimate Greek Salad
ingredient_list: 12 cup feta, cubed (or crumbled, more to taste)
lettuce leaf, to serve salad on (optional)
instruction_list: Prepare the dressing:.
In a small bowl, combine vinegar, oregano, salt and pepper.
Slowly add olive oil, whisking to combine.
Set aside.
Rinse and drain beans.
Dice tomatoes, bell pepper, onion, cucumber.
Remove excess liquid from tomatoes.
Put vegetables and beans in a large bowl.
Toss dressing with salad.
Add feta, lightly toss.
Best if refrigerated for an hour or two before serving (that is -- if you can wait that long).
Serve over lettuce leaves if desired.

810731.title: Greek Orzo Salad W/ Kalamata and Feta
instruction_list: Cook orzo until tender, 8-10 minutes.
Chill 20 minutes.
Add remaining salad ingredients to chilled orzo.
In a separate container, mix together dressing.
Pour over salad and let chill 30 minutes.

816170.title: AMIEs GREEN SALAD
ingredient_list: 1 medium head lettuce, torn into bite-size pcs.
1 small head radicchio torn into bite-size pcs.
2 tbsps. aceto balsamico or balsamic venigar
instruction_list: Put the lettuce, radicchio, carrots, tomatoes and cucumber in a large bowl.
Add the balsamic venigar, and lemon juice.
Mix well all ingredients.
Drizzle with oil and toss to coat.
Serves 4.

107729.title: Toss 'n' Go Green Salad
ingredient_list: 2 cups seedless grapes (red or green, or a combination of both)
instruction_list: Combine greens, grapes, carrots and mozzarella cheese in a salad bowl.
Mix dressing lemon juice, basil and oregano.
Toss mixed greens with 1/4 cup dressing.
Sprinkle with pepper and serve.

973429.title: Bangkok style green papaya salad recipe
ingredient_list: 2 tbsp dried prawns, rinsed and drained
2 slices or small wedges of lime (optional)
2 snake beans, cut into 1cm lengths (or use fine green beans)
4 to 6 bird's eye chillies, to taste
2 tbsp shaved palm sugar, adjust to taste
instruction_list: Using a pestle and mortar, pound the garlic with the salt then add the peanuts and dried prawns and pound to a coarse paste.
Add the lime (if using), bruising it with the pestle, then add the cherry tomatoes and beans to the mortar and carefully work everything together.
Next add the birds eye chillies, barely crushing them.
Finally, add the green papaya and lightly bruise with the pestle, while turning and tossing the mixture with a large spoon held in your other hand.
Season the salad with palm sugar, fish sauce, lime juice and tamarind water.
It should taste sweet, sour, hot and salty.

433890.title: Green Picnic Salad Recipe
ingredient_list: 3 1/2 ounce. pkg. instant pistachio pudding mix
instruction_list: Make one day ahead.
Mix the dry pudding mix with the can of pineapple.
(Don't drain pineapple.)
Add in the marshmallows, pecan pcs and Cold Whip.
Chill till serving.

461014.title: Jellied Green Salad
ingredient_list: 1 cup chopped celery or 1 cup green pepper
1 cup peas (frozen cook in microwave 2 minutes)
instruction_list: Soak the gelatin in the cold water for 5 minutes.
Dissolve in the boiling water.
Add the sugar, salt, vinegar, lemon juice cool.
When the mixture begins to set, add the chopped vegetables and cherries.
Pour into oiled mould and chill.

458964.title: Spanish Green Bean Salad
ingredient_list: 2 lbs green beans, trim ends and cut into 1-inch pieces
2 ounces red bell peppers, roasted, skinned and diced (in the USA, you can buy this in a jar as pimiento)
2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar (white vinegar is also okay)
1 -2 teaspoon sugar (depending on your sweet tooth)
instruction_list: Cook beans in the microwave for 6-7 minutes until crisp-tender.
Or you can cook in a pan with a small amount of boiling water.
Put the next 9 ingredients (dressing) in a jar with a lid.
Cover and shake well.
Pour dressing over beans, stir well and refrigerate (I usually put this all in a container with a tight-fitting lid and shake the dickens out of it).
Serve over shredded lettuce -- at whatever temperature you prefer.
It takes at least an hour for this to come to room temperature after being in the fridge.

753136.title: Tossed Green Salad With Apples & Bananas Recipe
ingredient_list: 2 tbsp. lemon juice, sprinkle over fruit
instruction_list: Blend together and pour over fruit:

265445.title: Green Apple and Beet Salad
instruction_list: Wash, quarter and core the apple.
Slice thinly.
Mix beet and apple slices.
Add vinaigrette; toss to coat.

258462.title: Green Salad
ingredient_list: 1 (20 ounce) cancrushed dole pineapple (no sugar added)
instruction_list: Drain juice from pineapple.
Take one cup of hot water and mix with the sugar free lime jello to dissolve.
Then add one cup pineapple juice.
Put the mixture in the frig.
Put one can of evap milk in freezer.
When the jello starts to gell, take the pet milk ouf of the freezer and whip, add jello to mixture and stir.
Add pecans, pineapple and cut up cream cheese to mixture.
Mix all together and put in frig.

948993.title: Mixed Green Salad With Buttermilk Dressing Recipe
ingredient_list: 4 c. chilled Boston lettuce leaves, torn in bite size pcs
3 c. chilled spinach leaves, washed well & torn in bite size pcs
instruction_list: In large salad bowl, combine lettuce and spinach.
Add in dressing and toss to coat.
Sprinkle with minced egg and serve immediately.
Makes 4 servings.
Calories 109; Exchange 1/2 protein, 3 1/2 vegetable, 1 fat, 15 opt.
calories.

551713.title: Pomegranate, Mango and Mixed Green Salad with Red Wine Vinaigrette
ingredient_list: Red Wine Vinaigrette, Amount As Desired
instruction_list: Assemble ingredients: greens, pomegranate, mango, walnuts, and red wine vinaigrette.
Wash the greens, pomegranate and mango.
Assemble greens on six individual plates for easier assembly.
Slice the pomegranate into fourths, then peel out the seeds and put them onto the top of the greens.
Peel, pit and slice the mango.
Assemble mango slices across the top of the salads.
Sprinkle on walnuts.
Drizzle red wine vinaigrette over the top.
Enjoy!

310692.title: CATALINA Fresh Fruit & Green Salad
ingredient_list: 1 cup sliced fresh strawberries Safeway 1 lb For $3.99 thru 02/09
instruction_list: Combine all ingredients except sunflower kernels.
Sprinkle with sunflower kernels.

373786.title: Green Salad with Toasted Walnuts
instruction_list: Toss salad with vinaigrette, sprinkle with toasted walnuts.

728297.title: Mixed Green Salad with Grapes and Blue Cheese Dressing
instruction_list: In a salad bowl, combine the greens, grapes, and pecan halves.
Mix, add the dressing, and toss to coat.

688696.title: Green Pistachio Salad Recipe
instruction_list: Mix all together and chill.

879457.title: Green Jello Salad Recipe
ingredient_list: 1 sm. can crushed pineapple, not liquid removed
instruction_list: Mix Jello with boiling water.
Blend in crushed pineapple and lowfat sour cream.
Add in cherries and nuts.
Mix well, put in mold and chill.
This can set out for hrs and won't heat.

749835.title: Vietnamese Green Papaya Shrimp Salad
ingredient_list: 1 12 lbs papayas (peeled, seeded, and finely shredded)
instruction_list: Prepare the Nuoc Cham.
Boil the shrimp in hot water for 3-4 minutes.
Shell, devein, and slice in half.
Set aside.
In a salad bowl, combine the shredded papaya, shredded carrot, shrimps, cilantro (or mint), chopped chili pepper, Nuoc Cham, and mix well.
Serve.

18833.title: Dessert Salad with Green Grapes
instruction_list: Get out your double boiler and combine eggs, sugar, flour and juices in it, and cook over simmering water until mixture is thickened; cool.
After it has cooled, fold whipped cream into this cooled mixture.
Fold remaining ingredients into your whipped cream mixture and cover it and Chill overnight.

786872.title: Green Salad With Pickled Beets, Eggs, and Goat Cheese
ingredient_list: balsamic vinaigrette (I use Kittencal's Balsamic Vinaigrette made with lemon balsamic vinegar)
instruction_list: combine lettuce mix, beets, cucumber, eggs, and cheese.
Serve with vinaigrette dressing on the side.

410714.title: Grilled Asian-Style BBQ Steak on Green Salad
ingredient_list: 1 beef flank steak (1 lb.) King Sooper's 1 lb For $4.99 thru 02/09
1/2 cup KRAFT Lite Asian Toasted Sesame Dressing, divided
1 pkg. (10 oz.) torn mixed salad greens
instruction_list: Score steak on both sides with shallow cross-cuts; place in shallow dish.
Pour 1/4 cup dressing over steak; turn to evenly coat both sides of steak with dressing.
Refrigerate 20 min.
to marinate.
Heat grill to medium-high heat.
Remove steak from marinade; discard marinade.
Grill steak 5 min.
on each side.
Grill an additional 10 min.
or until steak is medium doneness, turning and brushing occasionally with barbecue sauce.
Remove steak from grill; cut across the grain into thin slices.
Toss salad greens with peas, tomatoes and remaining dressing.
Spoon onto platter; top with meat.

74777.title: My Green Salad
instruction_list: Tear romaine, slice cucumber, cube avocado.
Combine.
Add dressing.
Eat.

995749.title: Green Papaya Salad Ala Bobby Flay
ingredient_list: 2 (1 lb) green papayas, peeled, seeded and julienned
instruction_list: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
Add the string beans and cook for 2 minutes.
Remove and plunge into cold water to stop further cooking.
Drain well and cut each bean in half.
Halve the tomatoes lengthwise and remove the seeds.
Slice the halves into 1/8-inch strips.
Roughly chop all but 2 tablespoons of peanuts.
In a bowl toss papaya with the beans, tomatoes, chopped peanuts, fish sauce, lemon and lime juices, sugar, garlic, red pepper flakes and 3 tablespoons cilantro.
Garnish with remaining peanuts and cilantro.

750060.title: Green Papaya Salad
instruction_list: Crush the dried shrimp with the chiles and garlic cloves, then whisk in the lime juice, fish sauce and the sugar.
Toss the dressing with the papaya and serve.

674705.title: Green Garden Salad Recipe
ingredient_list: 1 can sliced water chestnuts or possibly garbanzo beans
instruction_list: Drain vegetables.
Marinate overnight.
Improves with age.
Keeps 3 weeks.
Stir from time to time.

448260.title: Green Jello Salad
instruction_list: Dissolve gelatin in 2 1/4 cup boiling water.
Drain pineapple and add 1/4 cup of the pineapple liquid to the gelatin mixture.
Add pineapple to gelatin.
Pour into 9 x 13 glass casserole and refrigerate until soft set.
Mix the softened cream cheese and milk together until combined.
Add the nuts to cheese/milk mixture.
Mix the jello mixture and cream cheese mixture together.
Refrigerate overnight and cut into squares to serve.

633211.title: Green and Gold Salad
instruction_list: In a large bowl mix all together, chill and serve.

65379.title: Mary's Green Salad Recipe
instruction_list: Mix dressing and chill.
Make green salad and serve with chilled dressing.

675383.title: Spicy Green Papaya Salad
ingredient_list: 1/4 cup plus 3 tablespoons palm sugar or light brown sugar
1/4 pound thin green beans, halved crosswise
1/3 cup coarsely chopped roasted, salted peanuts
instruction_list: In a small bowl, cover the dried shrimp with hot water.
Let stand for 5 minutes, then drain.
Cut the shrimp into thirds.
Using a serrated knife, halve the papaya crosswise and peel the skin.
Scrape out the seeds.
Using a mandoline, julienne the flesh (you should have about 6 cups).
In a large mortar, pound the chiles to a coarse paste with the garlic.
Add the sugar and shrimp and pound until blended.
Add the green beans and lightly pound them.
Pour in the lime juice and fish sauce and stir to dissolve the sugar.
Add the tomatoes and lightly pound them.
Scrape the mixture into a large bowl.
Add the papaya and peanuts, toss well and serve.

354229.title: German/Bavarian Chopped Green Salad Mit Borretsch
ingredient_list: 1 head lettuce (I used butter lettuce mixed with red loose leaf lettuce however any heirloom lettuce would be ideal)
3 tablespoons fresh borage leaves, chopped (and a few borage flowers if available)
instruction_list: Wash the lettuce and watercress well and spin dry.
Prepare the dressing in a non-reactive container and set aside.
Best prepared at least 1 hour in advance.
Combine the salad ingredients together in a large salad bowl with the dressing.
Toss to coat.
Garnish with additional borage leaves and flowers.
fyi: A sprinkle of freshly grated black pepper tasted really good on the salad.

956802.title: Green 'N Gold Salad Recipe
ingredient_list: 1 pkg. (10 ounce.) frzn green peas, rinsed and liquid removed
1/2 c. mayonnaise or possibly salad dressing
instruction_list: Prepare potatoes as directed on package for stove top method.
Pour into large bowl; cover and chill till well chilled.
Stir remaining ingredients except mayonnaise into potatoes; toss with mayonnaise.
Cover and chill at least 2 hrs.
Serve on lettuce leaves if you like.

999705.title: Mandarin Orange Salad
ingredient_list: 2 heads butter lettuce - rinsed, and torn
instruction_list: Prepare the dressing by whisking together the sour cream, mayonnaise, milk, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, sugar, white pepper and cayenne pepper.
Store in an air-tight container and refrigerate.
Prepare the salad in a large bowl by combining the lettuce, onion, oranges and mushrooms.
Add enough dressing to coat and toss.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper and add croutons if desired.

229137.title: Orange Couscous Salad
ingredient_list: 1 (16 ounce) can chickpeas, rinsed and drained
instruction_list: Bring water to boil in a 1-qt saucepan over high heat.
Add couscous, turmeric, and pepper.
Remove from heat, cover, and let stand for 5 minutes.
Fluff with a fork and transfer to a large bowl.
Stir in the chickpeas, oranges, onions, and raisins.
In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, oil, and orange peel.
Pour over the salad and toss to mix well.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.

1028237.title: Mandarin Orange Salad
instruction_list: Combine 1/4 cup white sugar, salt, pepper, vinegar and oil.
Heat until sugar dissolves.
Cool.
Meanwhile cook almonds and 6 tsp.
sugar over med-low heat in saucepan stirring constantly until sugar melts and almonds coated.
Cool and break apart.
Break apart lettuces into bite size pieces.
Add thinly sliced celery, cut on diagonal and thinly sliced green onions.
5 minutes before serving toss with drained mandarin oranges, sugared almonds and cooled dressing.
If desired can add a few pieces of chunked pineapple and top with a few crunchy chow mein noodles.

916507.title: Oregano-Flavored Orange Salad
instruction_list: Take the orange segments out of their sacs, and cut each into half.
Slice the broccoli stem thinly, and microwave for about 1 and a half minutes.
Leave to cool.
Mix the ingredients together to make the dressing.
Put the baby salad greens, orange segments, and broccoli on a serving plate, pour the dressing over, sprinkle on some oregano and it's done.

10740.title: Quinoa, Golden Beet, and Orange Salad
ingredient_list: 1/2 cup thinly sliced scallions, white and green parts
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
instruction_list: Preheat the oven to 400F.
Wrap the beets in a loose aluminum-foil package, sealing the package tightly.
Bake until the beets are tender when pierced with the tip of a paring knife, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
When cool enough to handle, peel the beets and cut into 3/4-inch dice.
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat.
Add the quinoa and cook until tender, about 12 minutes.
Drain and spread on a sheet pan to cool.
Cut a slice off both ends of each orange so they will stand upright.
Stand each orange on a work surface and, using a sharp knife, remove all the peel and membrane by slicing from top to bottom all the way around the orange, following the contour of the fruit.
Cut the oranges into 3/4-inch cubes.
Put the cooled quinoa in a large bowl.
Add the beets, oranges, scallions, and walnuts.
For the dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, mustard, and honey.
Gradually whisk in the oils.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add to the salad and toss to coat.
Taste, adjust the seasoning, and serve.

137389.title: Sugar-and-Spice Orange Salad
ingredient_list: 2 seedless oranges, peeled and all white pith removed
14 cup frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
instruction_list: First, prepare a batch of my Sugar-and-Spice Nuts, recipe#12761 here at Recipezaar; this can be done ahead of time, just make sure you reserve 3/4 cup and don't eat them all!
Wash salad greens and dry them, then place in serving dish; a wide, fairly flat dish looks best for presentation.
Peel oranges by slicing off a thin layer of the top and bottom, then placing oranges on your cutting board and, with a sharp knife, follow the curves of the orange to cut off peel and pith.
Thinly slice oranges and add to salad greens along with red onion.
Prepare dressing by whisking together the thawed concentrate, sherry vinegar, olive oil and salt and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and lightly toss.
Garnish with nuts and serve immediately.

812732.title: Beet, Fennel and Mandarin Orange Salad
ingredient_list: 2 bunches baby red or gold beets
1 (15 ounce) can DOLE Mandarin Oranges, drained
instruction_list: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Place beets in medium roasting pan, add water to cover bottom of pan; cover with foil.
Roast 40 to 45 minutes or until beets are tender and can be pierced with a fork or knife.
Cool slightly; remove skin from beets and cut into wedges.
Trim off fennel leaves and stalk; cut into very thin slices.
Combine salad, mandarin oranges, mint, beets and fennel in large bowl.
Pour dressing over salad; toss to evenly coat.
Sprinkle cheese over salad.

148352.title: Zesty Orange Chicken Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1/2 cup MIRACLE WHIP FREE Dressing Family Dollar $3.50 thru 02/07
2 cups canned mandarin oranges (in juice), drained
instruction_list: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Mix MIRACLE WHIP, orange juice, ginger and basil in large bowl.
Add pasta, oranges, chicken and pecans.
Refrigerate several hours or until chilled.
Divide salad evenly among 4 plates.
Complement each with 5 TRISCUIT crackers.
Serve each person an 8 fl oz glass of milk with the meal.

643438.title: Mandarin Orange Oreo Salad
ingredient_list: 1 (3 1/2 ounce) box instant vanilla pudding (The larger box)
instruction_list: Whip buttermilk and pudding together.
Add oranges and fold in Cool Whip.
Before serving add crushed oreo cookies.

463606.title: Spicy Orange Grilled Pork Chops with Salad
ingredient_list: 4 bone-in pork chops (1-1/4 lb.), 1/2 inch thick Safeway 1 lb For $1.99 thru 02/09
1 pkg. (10 oz.) torn baby salad greens
instruction_list: Heat grill to medium-high heat.
Mix barbecue sauce, juice and hot sauce.
Reserve 1/4 cup mixture; set aside.
Place each ear of corn on separate sheet of heavy-duty foil; spread with butter.
Wrap tightly with foil; grill 5 min.
Add chops; grill 5 min.
Brush chops with half of the remaining barbecue sauce mixture.
Turn chops and corn; grill 4 to 6 min.
or until corn is tender and chops are done (145 degrees F), turning corn occasionally.
Brushing chops with remaining barbecue sauce mixture.
Remove chops and corn from grill; let stand 3 min.
Meanwhile, toss salad greens with dressing.
Serve chops with reserved barbecue sauce mixture, corn and salad.

803382.title: Chicken and Orange Poppyseed Salad
ingredient_list: 500g smoked or BBQ chicken, cut into pieces Whole Foods 1 lb For $3.99 thru 02/09
1 teaspoon orange, segmented Safeway 1 lb For $0.79 thru 02/09
1 teaspoon grated orange rind Safeway 1 lb For $0.79 thru 02/09
instruction_list: Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender; drain.
Toss with remaining salad ingredients.
Combine dressing ingredients and drizzle over salad.
Garnish with parsley.

7271.title: Raisin Orange Salad Dressing
instruction_list: Combine all ingredients in a screw top jar and shake to mix well.
Serve chilled.

568827.title: Orange & Asparagus Salad
instruction_list: Blanch asparagus by boiling in a saucepan of water for 3-4 minutes or until bright green in colour.
Drain and rinse under cold running water.
Cut the rind and pith from oranges and slice thinly.
Place mesclun mix on a platter or in a bowl.
Top with blanched asparagus, orange slices and mandarin segments.
Pour over the dressing and serve.

210234.title: Mandarin Orange Jello Salad Recipe
ingredient_list: 2 (16 ounce.) cartons sm. curd cottage cheese
2 (6 ounce.) cartons orange Jello - don't dissolve Jello, just put in the dry pwdr
3 (11 ounce.) cans mandarin oranges, liquid removed
instruction_list: Combine cottage cheese, Cold Whip and dry Jello; mix well.
Mix in mandarin oranges.
Chill for 24 hrs before serving.

503478.title: Beet, Mandarin Orange and Spinach Salad
ingredient_list: 1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges, well drained (in light syrup)
14 cup bottled poppy seed dressing (if you don't like poppy seed dressing you can use a basic vinaigrette dressing)
3 fresh beets (used in place of the canned beets)
instruction_list: CANNED BEET RECIPE:.
Place spinach in a salad bowl.
Add remaining ingredients; toss and serve.
5 minutes prep time; no cooking time.
FRESH BEET RECIPE:.
Preheat oven to 450F Remove beet greens from 3 fresh beets; rinse beets and wrap tightly in foil.
Bake for 40-50 minutes or until tender when pierced with a fork.
Unwrap foil and remove skin by rubbing firmly with paper towels.
Refrigerate beets until cool; cut into pieces and add to salad.
5 minutes prep time; 1 hour cooking time; 1 hour cooling time.

351169.title: Orange Buttermilk Molded Salad (Gelatin)
ingredient_list: 1 (8 1/2 ounce) can crushed pineapple in syrup
2 cups buttermilk (DO NOT use a substitute!)
1 (8 ounce) carton frozen whipped topping, thawed
instruction_list: In a large saucepan, bring pineapple and syrup to a boil.
Remove from heat; stir in gelatin.
Cool to room temperature.
Stir in the buttermilk.
Fold in whipped topping and pecans.
Pour into an 8-cup mold; chill 4 hours or overnight.

964766.title: Crispy Duck Salad with Bitter Orange Vinaigrette
ingredient_list: 1 1/2 to 2 pounds packaged duck breast -- ask at your meat counter -- if the market does not carry duck breast year round, it can usually be ordered for you
1 head frissee greens -- look for very lightly colored frissee
3 scallions, thinly sliced on an angle
3 tablespoons sherry vinegar or red wine vinegar, eyeball it
1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil -- eyeball it
instruction_list: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Score fat and skin on duck breasts.
Place duck breast skin side down in a large cold skillet with a heat safe handle.
Put skillet on stove and turn burner on to moderate heat.
Cook breasts 5 to 8 minutes, turning once the skin crisps and most of the fat is rendered.
Place the skillet in the oven and cook another 9 to 12 minutes.
Meat should be pink at center.
Arrange greens on individual plates or 1 large platter.
Arrange frissee and scallions on bed of baby greens.
Combine shallots, vinegar and marmalade.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Whisk in extra-virgin olive oil.
Slice duck breast and serve 6 to 8 ounces per person, arranging the sliced duck on the salad.
Grilled or sauteed chicken or pork is delicious with this dressing as well.
Pour dressing evenly over duck and salad.

159395.title: Mandarin Orange Artichoke Heart Salad Recipe
ingredient_list: 1 can mandarin orange segments, liquid removed
1 can artichoke hearts, liquid removed & quartered
1/2 c. pecans, whole or possibly broken
instruction_list: Wash lettuce, dry thoroughly.
Add in liquid removed orange segments, artichoke hearts and pecan.
Dressing: Whisk oil in a steady stream into bowl of vinegar.
Add in pepper and whisk.
Dress salad and toss.

702121.title: Prune Flan with Orange Salad
instruction_list: In a small saucepan, cook 1/3 cup of the sugar over moderate heat, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, until a dark caramel forms, about 5 minutes.
Immediately pour the caramel into the bottom of an 8-by-1-inch ring mold and arrange the prunes on the caramel, spacing them evenly.
Let cool completely.
In another small saucepan, combine the milk with 3 tablespoons of the sugar.
Scrape the seeds from half of the vanilla bean; add the seeds and scraped bean to the milk and bring to a boil.
Meanwhile, in a medium bowl, vigorously whisk the eggs with 3 tablespoons of the sugar until the mixture turns pale.
Gradually whisk in the hot milk.
Strain the custard into a bowl and let cool.
Preheat the oven to 325.
Set the caramel-lined mold in a small roasting pan and pour in the custard.
Set the pan in the oven.
Add enough hot water to the pan to reach halfway up the side of the mold.
Bake for about 50 minutes, or until the flan is just set and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let cool in the water bath for 10 minutes, then transfer the ring mold to a rack and let cool to room temperature.
Refrigerate the flan for at least 2 hours.
Meanwhile, using a sharp knife, peel the oranges; be sure to remove all of the bitter white pith.
Working over a bowl, cut in between the membranes to release the orange segments.
Scrape the seeds from the remaining vanilla bean half into the oranges.
Toss gently with the orange liqueur and the remaining 2 teaspoons of sugar.
To unmold the flan, bring 1/2 inch of water to a boil in a large skillet.
Carefully stand the mold in the skillet for 1 minute, then remove it and wipe the bottom dry.
Using a small knife, gently free the flan from the mold.
Tilt the mold; if the caramel doesn't seep out, return the mold to hot water and repeat.
Place a serving platter on top of the ring mold and invert the flan onto the platter.
Tap the mold lightly and lift it off.
Spoon the orange salad into the center of the flan.
Slice the flan and serve with the oranges and caramel sauce.

674342.title: North African Orange Salad
ingredient_list: 4 oranges (peeled, deseeded, cut into bite sized pieces)
instruction_list: In a bowl, mix oranges, pomegranate seeds, almonds and pistachios toether.
Microwave honey and water together for 30 seconds and stir.
Pour honey mixture over fruit nut mixture and toss lightly until coated.
Sprinkle with cinnamon and orange zest.
Enjoy.

299359.title: Mandarin Orange Jello Salad Recipe
ingredient_list: 10 ounce. Cold Whip or possibly similar
instruction_list: Mix Jello, cream cheese and 2 c. boiling water with mixer.
Drain 2 cans of oranges and add in to Jello mix (retain juice).
Add in sufficient cool water to retained juice to make 1 1/2 c. and then add in to Jello mix.
Chill till slightly thick.
Add 10 oz Cold Whip and fold in with wire whisk.
Chill overnight.
Serves 8 to 12.

241477.title: Spiced Orange Salad
ingredient_list: 6 oranges (about 2 1/2 inches wide, 2 1/2 pounds total, see notes)
1 mild red onion, peeled and sliced (6 ounces)
12 cup finely slivered fresh mint leaves
about 1/2 cup black olives (Nicoise or kalamata)
34 teaspoon cumin seeds or 34 teaspoon ground cumin
12 teaspoon paprika or 12 teaspoon mild ground red chili pepper
12 teaspoon black peppercorns or 14 teaspoon ground black pepper
instruction_list: With a small, sharp knife, cut peel and white membrane from oranges.
Slice the oranges crosswise 1/8 to 1/4 inch thick and discard seeds.
In a small bowl, mix 4 tablespoons vinegar with olive oil and sugar.
Stir in the spice blend.
In a wide, shallow bowl, gently mix orange slices, onions, slivered mint, and chopped cilantro.
Pour in dressing and mix gently.
Taste and add more salt and more vinegar if desired.
Scatter olives, mint leaves, and cilantro leaves over the top.
Spoon salad and dressing onto plates.

SPICE BLEND: Combine 3/4 teaspoon cumin seeds or ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon paprika or mild ground chili, 1/2 teaspoon black peppercorns or 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/4 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme leaves, 1/4 teaspoon curry powder, and 1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon; if using whole spices, whirl mixture in a grinder or small food processor to a powder.

706558.title: Orange Pomegranate Salad
instruction_list: Slice off the top and bottom of the orange.
With the orange standing upright, cut off peel vertically.
Flip the orange on its side and cut crosswise into 1/2-inch slices.
Repeat with remaining oranges and arrange slices on a large platter.
Sprinkle with pomegranate seeds.
In a small bowl, mix together orange juice and honey.
Drizzle right over the fruit and serve.
Recipe courtesy of Taste of Home magazine.

186638.title: Angela's Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1 lb elbow macaroni (cooked, drained and cooled)
1 (1 ounce) envelope Italian salad dressing mix
instruction_list: In a small bowl whisk together the mayo and dressing mix until very well blended.
I.
n a large bowl gently mix the other ingredients, then add the dressing, tossing together until well coated.
Refrigerate until chilled through.
*Tip: There should be about the same amount of cheese, pickles, green onions, olives and peas.
I mix these with the pasta to see if it *looks* right before adding the sauce.

139938.title: Spiral Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 10 ounces garden spiral shaped pasta, cooked and drained
instruction_list: Mix pasta and next 8 ingredients until well blended.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Chill for several hours.
Serve and enjoy.
Time to make does not include chill time.

511781.title: Zippity Pasta Salad
instruction_list: Cook noodles and drain.
Add green pepper and onion.
Make up sauce and mix together.
Pour over noodles, mix and chill.
For best results leave in refigerator overnight.

51852.title: Maxine's Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1 lb penne pasta, cooked al dente
1 (6 ounce) can pitted black olives, sliced in half
1 orange bell pepper, cleaned,seeds removed,and chopped
1 (3/4 ounce) packet Good Seasonings Italian salad dressing mix
instruction_list: Prepare packet of salad dressing with oil and vinegar, as stated on envelope.
Place cooked pasta in a large bowl.
Add sliced mushrooms, olives, peppers, asparagus, cheese and Italian dressing.
Mix well.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Mix well and adjust s&p or cheese to taste.
Serve at room temperature.
Maxine likes to arrange some of the colored vegetables on top for a prettier presentation.

156515.title: Garden Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1 pkg. (10.4 oz.) KRAFT Classic Ranch with Bacon Pasta Salad
1 pkg. (6 oz.) OSCAR MAYER Smoked Ham, chopped
instruction_list: Prepare Pasta Salad as directed on package.
Add remaining ingredients; mix lightly.
Serve immediately.
Or, cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.

69302.title: Fruit N' Yogurt Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 4 ounces macaroni or 4 ounces pasta shells, uncooked
1 (11 ounce) can mandarin orange segments, drained
1 (6 ounce) container lemon low fat yogurt
instruction_list: Cook macaroni as directed on package.
Drain; rinse with cold water.
In medium bowl, combine all ingredients except yogurt and strawberries; mix gently.
Stir in yogurt; mix gently to coat.
Cover; refrigerate 1 to 2 hours to blend flavors.
Just before serving, stir in strawberries.

404031.title: Shrimp Louis Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 3-1/2 qt. elbow macaroni, cooked, drained and chilled
1 qt. Peeled deveined salad shrimp, cooked
1 qt. KRAFT Light Thousand Island Reduced Fat Dressing
2 cups KRAFT MAYO Fat Free Mayonnaise Dressing
instruction_list: Toss macaroni with celery, shrimp, eggs and onion in large bowl.
Add dressings; mix lightly.
Cover.
Refrigerate until ready to serve.

840780.title: Warm Chicken Pasta over Salad
ingredient_list: 1 (7 3/4 ounce) box Kraft italian pasta salad mix (or Caesar)
instruction_list: Prepare pasta mix as directed on box.
Saute chicken in skillet until done.
Slice chicken in thin, 2 inch strips and add to prepared pasta mix.
Serve pasta over salad mix.

192569.title: Pasta Side Salad Made Over
ingredient_list: 1/3 cup MIRACLE WHIP Light Dressing Family Dollar $3.50 thru 02/07
1/4 cup KRAFT Lite Zesty Italian Dressing
1 cup KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Colby & Monterey Jack Cheeses
3/4 cup matchlike carrot sticks Target 2 lb For $3.00 thru 02/06
instruction_list: Mix dressings in large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients; mix lightly.
Refrigerate 30 min.

182191.title: Herbed Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 12 cup loosely packed of fresh mint, rinsed and dried
12 cup loosely packed fresh dill, rinsed and dried
1 cup loosely packed parsley, rinsed and dried
1 lb small penne, cooked until al dente,rinsed in cold water
1 seedless cucumber, halved lengthwise and cut into 1/4 inch thick slices
1 can corn or 12 lb fresh cooked corn kernel
instruction_list: Puree mint, dill and parsley with scallion, mayonnaise and buttermilk, add salt to taste.
In a very large bowl, toss pasta with dressing, cucumber and corn.
Chill, covered, for 1 hour.
May be made up to 1 day in advance.

83789.title: Garden Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 8 ounces barilla campanelle pasta, cooked according to package directions
instruction_list: Cook snow peas, carrots and cauliflower in boiling water 3 minutes; drain.
Combine cooked campanelle and vegetables in large bowl.
Just before serving, add salad dressing; toss lightly.

748028.title: Pasta Chicken Salad
ingredient_list: 2 red apples, cubed with skin on
2 yellow apples, cubed with skin on
instruction_list: Soak apples in pineapple tidbits before mixing.
Throw everything together.

505372.title: Seafood Pasta Salad
instruction_list: Boil Noodles until soft.
Drain and run under cold water for 5 minutes.
Whip together Mayo,Dill and Creamy Cucumber dressings.
Toss all ingredients together with salad dressing.
Chill 1 hour in fridge and eat with fresh garlic toast or breadsticks.

402702.title: Ranch Chicken Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1 cup ranch salad dressing (I used Hidden Valley Ranch)
instruction_list: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat.
Place breasts into a glass dish and marinate in steak sauce for 30 minutes to 1 hour.
Grill chicken until no longer pink inside and the juices run clear.
Remove from grill and chop into bite-size pieces.
To a large pot of boiling water, add bouillon cubes and pasta.
Cook pasta until al dente.
Drain, and rinse under cold water.
In a large bowl, combine chicken, pasta, onion, avocados and tomatoes.
Mix in salad dressing, cover and refrigerate until chilled.

589264.title: Creamy Chicken Club Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 2 cans (5 oz. each) chunk white chicken breast, drained
2 plum tomatoes, seeded, chopped Safeway 1 lb For $1.29 thru 02/09
4 slices cooked OSCAR MAYER Bacon, crumbled
1/2 cup MIRACLE WHIP Dressing Family Dollar $3.50 thru 02/07
instruction_list: Combine ingredients.

601011.title: California Club Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1 avocado, chopped Whole Foods 5 ea For $5.00 thru 02/09
1/2 cup chopped plum tomatoes King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09
4 slices cooked OSCAR MAYER Bacon, crumbled
instruction_list: Mix ranch dressing and MIRACLE WHIP until blended.
Combine all remaining ingredients except bacon in large bowl.
Add dressing mixture; mix lightly.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
Top with bacon just before serving.

916508.title: Raw Vegan Pasta Sauce / Salad Dressing
instruction_list: Remove the pits from your dates.
In a high speed blender/Vitamix, add your water and dates.
Let them soak for 10 minutes.
Add the remaining ingredients and blend until smooth.
Taste and add additional spices if desired.
Add more water if you want a thinner consistency.
Pour over a bed of lettuce and veggies or over spiralized zucchini for a Raw Vegan Pasta Dish.
Enjoy.

11666.title: Vegetable Medley Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1 pkg. (200 g) Kraft Dinner Whole Wheat Macaroni and Cheese
1/4 cup Miracle Whip Calorie-Wise Spread Family Dollar $3.50 thru 02/07
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, cut in half
instruction_list: Cook Macaroni in boiling water 6 to 7 min.
or just until tender.
Meanwhile, mix Miracle Whip, yogurt, milk, mustard and Cheese Sauce Mix in medium bowl until well blended.
Add macaroni and remaining ingredients; mix lightly.
Refrigerate 1 hour.

502129.title: Tiki's Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1 lb cooked spiral shaped pasta (Fuselli, Rotini or Scooby Doo)
12 cup black olives, sliced and drained
12 teaspoon onion powder or 12 teaspoon garlic powder
instruction_list: Cook Pasta as per package directions.
Drain and rinse with COLD water for a few minutes.
Wash, Dry and dice veggies while pasta is cooking.
Pour pasta into a large bowl and add diced veggies and olives.
In a jar (with lid) mix vinegar, oil and spices.
Put lid on the jar and shake it well for about 3 minutes.
Pour over veggie/pasta mixture and toss well (bowl with a secure lid is perfect for this).
Refrigerate until ready to serve!
Enjoy!

530924.title: Easy Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 2 cups whole wheat rotini pasta, uncooked
1/3 cup KRAFT Lite House Italian Dressing
1/4 cup KRAFT Reduced Fat Parmesan Style Grated Topping
instruction_list: Cook pasta in large saucepan as directed on package, omitting salt and adding broccoli to the boiling water for the last 2 min.
; drain.
Place in medium bowl.
Add remaining ingredients; mix lightly.
Refrigerate several hours or until chilled.

519869.title: Zesty Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 15 ounces, weight Can Kidney Beans, Rinsed And Drained
1 whole Small Red Onion, Cut Into Halves And Thinly Sliced
instruction_list: To make the dressing, whisk the oil, vinegar, sugar, basil, lemon juice, mustard, garlic, and pepper in a small bowl until well-blended.
Bring a large sauce pan of water to a boil.
Add the broccoli and cook for 3 minutes, then remove the broccoli and place in ice water to stop the cooking process.
Drain the broccoli.
In the same boiling water, add the pasta and cook according to package directions.
Drain the pasta and rinse under cold water until cool.
Combine pasta, broccoli, beans, carrots, and onion in a large bowl.
Add dressing and toss to coat.
Place lettuce leaves on a plate or bowl then top with the pasta, broccoli mixture, then sprinkle with the cheese.

167588.title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 2 cups Veggie Rotini Pasta (such As Wacky Mac Brand)
1- 1/2 Tablespoon Fresh Lemon Juice (From About 1 Small Juicy Lemon)
instruction_list: Cook the pasta according to package directions.
Drain and rinse under cold water.
Place pasta in a large bowl.
Add the rest of the ingredients and toss to combine.
Top with crumbled feta cheese.
Serve at room temperature or cold.

799179.title: The Ultimate Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1 (16 ounce) package uncooked tri-colored spiral pasta
1 head fresh broccoli, cut into bite size pieces
1 head fresh cauliflower, chopped into bite size pieces
8 ounces pepperoni slices, cut into quarters
1 (8 ounce) package mozzarella cheese, cut into cubes
1 (6 ounce) can large pitted black olives, drained and sliced
1/2 cup olive oil, or to taste
1/2 cup red wine vinegar, or to taste
instruction_list: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Place pasta in the pot, cook for 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente, and drain.
Transfer to a bowl, cover, and chill 1 hour in the refrigerator.
Toss chilled pasta with the broccoli, cauliflower, red onion, garlic, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, olives, olive oil, and red wine vinegar.
Season with salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning.
Chill in the refrigerator until serving.

952454.title: Easy Mediterranean Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 8 ounces pasta prefer whole wheat, any kind
2 each sweet red bell peppers, roasted slice into strips
1/2 cup artichoke hearts marinated, sliced, plus 2 tablespoon marinate juice from the jar
1/4 cup sundried tomatoes oil-packed and sliced
1/4 cup kalamata olives cured, pitted and sliced
1/2 cup chickpeas (garbanzo beans) canned or cooked, rinsed and drained
2 tablespoons parsley leaves freshly and finely chopped
instruction_list: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil, and cook pasta according to the package.
Drain well and toss with 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
Set aside.
Meanwhile add all the other ingredients into a large mixing bowl.
Toss until well combined.
Stir in cooked pasta, and toss until well coated.
Serve or refrigerate until ready to use.
The salad can be made 1 day ahead, and keep it in the frige.

152466.title: pasta salad nancy's style
ingredient_list: 1 tablespoon horseradish (i like the minced kind)
instruction_list: use this as the base, add diced shrimp, or cubed spam, or try something new, serve chilled.

160131.title: Bayou Pasta Salad Recipe
ingredient_list: 2 1/4 ounce canned ripe olives -- sliced and liquid removed
instruction_list: Whisk together first 4 ingredients in a large bowl.
Add in pasta and 4 ingredients, tossing to coat.
Garnish with sprigs of fresh parsley and grape tomatoes.
4 servings.

402862.title: "Italian Sandwich" Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 4 -5 cups of cooked tri-color spiral pasta
1 can ripe olives or 1 can black olives, drained and halved
1 cup of chopped sweet pepper (green, yellow, red)
1 can water chestnut, slices drained & chopped
1 cup of chopped ham or 1 cup pastrami or 1 cup any meat, of choice (optional)
12 cup of chopped cooper cheese or 12 cup any cheese, of choice (optional)
12 teaspoon italian seasoning or 3 teaspoons fresh oregano, chopped
instruction_list: Cook pasta and set aside.
Place onions, dill pickles, olives, water chestnuts, chives and peppers in a bowl.
Add oil, vinegar and spices.
Marinate for 15-20 minutes or so.
Add pasta,tomatoes, meat and cheese and toss lightly.
Serve cold.

796112.title: Zesty Orzo Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1 whole Seeded And Diced Large Tomato
instruction_list: Cook orzo per package instructions.
Drain, and rinse in cold water; set aside.
Dice peppers, onions and tomato into nice small pieces.
Pour vegetables and parsley on top of the orzo pasta.
In a bowl, combine your favorite Italian salad dressing, olive oil, red wine vinegar, and lemon juice and whisk together.
Pour over the pasta and mix all the ingredients together well.
Allow to chill in the refrigerator for a minimum of 1 hour before serving.

76259.title: Easy (But Delicious!) Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: black olives, halved (can leave out, personal preference)
instruction_list: Boil pasta until al dente & cut up the rest of the ingredients as noted above.
Mix all of the ingredients together (except cheese) and refrigerate until ready to serve.
Add cheese immediately prior to serving.

687957.title: Perfect Pasta Salad
ingredient_list: 1 (1 lb) box rotini pasta, cooked as directerd
instruction_list: Mix all together well.
Serve, or refrigerate until chilled.

493963.title: Lemony Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 2 lbs red potatoes, cut into eighths
instruction_list: Bring potatoes and salted cold water to cover to a boil in a large pot; boil 15-17 minutes or just until tender.
Drain and let cool 5 minutes.
Whisk together the oil and next 4 ingredients in a large bowl.
Add warm potatoes, green onions, and parsley; toss to coat.
Serve at room temperature or chilled.
196 calorie, 9.7 g fat, 3.1 g protein, 25.4 g carb.

696181.title: Creole Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 14 cup dry crab boil seasoning (Zatarain's Pro Boil)
1 12 tablespoons creole seasoning (Tony Chachere's Creole Seasoning)
instruction_list: Bring potatoes, crab boil, and 4 quarts water to a boil in a large stockpot over high heat.
Boil 20 minutes or until tender; drain and cool 20 minutes.
Peel potatoes; cut into 3/4-inch pieces.
Toss together potatoes, eggs, and next 3 ingredients .
Stir in mayonnaise and mustard.
Variation-stir in 1 lb peeled deveined medium-sized shrimp (51/60 count).

778543.title: Potato Salad Fra Diavolo
ingredient_list: 2 1/2 pounds baby Yukon gold potatoes, halved
1 tablespoon grill seasoning or coarse salt and pepper
3 to 4 ribs celery with leafy greens, finely chopped
A generous handful fresh flat-leaf parsley, coarsely chopped
3 tablespoons chopped yellow hot pepper rings
instruction_list: Place potatoes in pot, cover with water, bring to a boil then salt the water.
Cook potatoes 12 to 15 minutes until tender.
While potatoes cook, combine spices and mustard with vinegar, whisk in EVOO and add the onions, celery and parsley to the bowl.
Drain potatoes and toss them in dressing while they're still hot, they'll absorb more dressing and flavor.
Garnish salad with chopped hot peppers.

668756.title: Herbed Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 2 lb. Yukon gold potatoes, cut into 1-inch cubes
instruction_list: Preheat baking sheet in 425F oven.
Cut four 20-inch sheets of foil.
Place potatoes in large bowl with 2 Tbs.
olive oil, toss to coat and season with salt and pepper.
Spoon 1/4 of potatoes on one half of foil sheet.
Fold foil over and crimp edges to seal.
Repeat with remaining foil sheets and potatoes.
Arrange packets in single layer on heated baking sheet.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes, or until potatoes are tender.
(Pierce packets with knife to test potatoes.)
Let stand 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, whisk vinegar, mayonnaise, sugar and remaining olive oil in bowl.
Add onion, celery, warm potatoes, chives and parsley.
Stir to combine, and serve.

110609.title: Old-Fashioned Potato Salad
ingredient_list: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instruction_list: Cover potatoes with salted cold water by 2 inches in a 3-quart saucepan and simmer uncovered until just tender, 15 to 25 minutes, depending on size of potatoes.
Drain in a colander and cool slightly.
While potatoes are simmering, whisk together vinegar and salt in a large bowl until salt is dissolved.
When potatoes are just cool enough to handle, peel potatoes and cut into 1-inch pieces, adding to vinegar mixture as cut, and toss gently with rubber spatula to combine.
Let cool to room temperature, then add remaining ingredients and salt and pepper to taste and stir gently to combine.
Serve at room temperature or chilled.

302086.title: Sweet Potato Apple Cinnamon Salad
instruction_list: Core apple and dice.
Juice limes and stir juice into apple pieces.
Toast almonds in a frying pan, let cool and dice into thirds or smaller.
Peel and grate sweet potato.
Add almonds, blueberries and grated sweet potato to apple; stir well.
Add sugar and cinnamon to taste, then stir well again.

130073.title: Lemon Herb Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 1/2 cup each: Miracle Whip Original Spread and yogurt Family Dollar $3.50 thru 02/07
12 small red potatoes, cooked and cubed (4 cups)
Zest of 1 lemon Safeway 4 ct For $5.00 thru 02/09
instruction_list: COMBINE Miracle Whip and yogurt with cooked potatoes.
(Potatoes can be boiled, microwaved or barbecued.)
DO NOT PEEL POTATOES.
ADD cucumber slices, zest and dill.
Mix well and chill.

685436.title: Crunchy Potato Chip-Chicken Salad Sandwich
ingredient_list: 1 pkg. (6 oz.) OSCAR MAYER CARVING BOARD Flame Grilled Chicken Breast Strips
1/4 cup seedless red grapes, halved Target 1 lb For $2.99 thru 02/06
2 tsp. GREY POUPON Harvest Coarse Ground Mustard
instruction_list: Combine first 6 ingredients.
Fill bread slices with spinach, chicken salad and potato chips to make 2 sandwiches.

399169.title: Chicken & Apple Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 3 cups chopped cooked chicken Safeway 1 lb For $1.99 thru 02/09
3 cups quartered red potatoes, cooked, cooled
1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen peas, thawed, drained
1 can (2-1/4 oz.) sliced black olives, drained
instruction_list: Combine ingredients.
Refrigerate several hours or until chilled.

685288.title: Sweet Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 1 (28 ounce) can sweet potatoes, drain and mash
instruction_list: Add sweet potatoes, celery and scullions together.
Mix well.
Add Miracle Whip, I start with a tablespoon and mix it in well.
Sometimes more, sometimes not.
Depends on your own tastes on this.
Place in serving bowl and refrigerate overnight.
Serve cold.
(There is no cooking time).

266912.title: Avocado and Sweet Potato Salad
instruction_list: Soak the sweet potato in water and discard the water.
Cut the cleaned sweet potato into 1.5cm chunks.
Boil or microwave to soften.
Cut the avocado lengthwise and twist into two halves.
Use a knife to remove the pit, peel and cut into 1.5cm chunks.
Mix the ingredients in a bowl.
Once the sweet potato has cooled, toss with the avocado and coat with .
It's done.

943138.title: Garden-Fresh New Potato & Bean Salad
ingredient_list: 1 lb. (450 g) each new red and new white potatoes, halved, cooked and cooled Safeway 2 pkg For $5.00 thru 02/09
1/4 lb. (125 g) fresh green beans, cut into 2-inch lengths, blanched and cooled
1/4 lb. (125 g) fresh yellow beans, cut into 2-inch lengths, blanched and cooled
instruction_list: Mix Miracle Whip and mustard in large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients; toss to evenly coat.
Refrigerate several hours or until chilled.

330944.title: Sweet Potato and Green Bean Salad
ingredient_list: 1 pound green beans, both ends removed, cut into pieces about 2-inches long
1 pound sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes
Zest from 1 washed lemon, to yield about 2 teaspoons
instruction_list: Place the green beans in boiling salted water and cook until al dente.
Remove and place in ice-cold water so they keep their bright green color.
Drain.
Place the pineapple juice, cumin and bay leaves in a small saucepan.
Simmer on low heat until reduced by half.
Pour the pineapple juice reduction in a bowl and mix with maple syrup and soy sauce.
Place the olive oil in a pan over high heat, add the sweet potatoes and cook until golden brown on all sides.
Place the sweet potatoes in a bowl and add the green beans, lemon zest and the maple-pineapple dressing.
Toss until mixed.
Mixing the dressing with the sweet potatoes while they are still warm allows even distribution of the dressing throughout the salad.
Cool to room temperature.
Place the arugula or watercress on the bottom of a plate and place the vegetables on top.
Sprinkle with the toasted sesame seeds.
Serve immediately.

966814.title: Salad Dressing For Potato Salad Recipe
instruction_list: Mix sugar and cornstarch in saucepan.
Mix vinegar and water and slowly add in to the beaten Large eggs.
Season with salt and slowly add in to sugar mix.
Cook till thick.

220459.title: Hot Scallop Salad with Potato Chips
ingredient_list: 13 cup scallions, spring or green onions thinly sliced
instruction_list: Rinse scallops well, pat dry, and cut crosswise about 1/4 inch thick.
To a 10 to 12 inch frying pan over medium-high heat, add oil and ginger.
With a slotted spoon, transfer scallops to a small bowl.
Cook remaining scallops; add to bowl.
Put leaves in a wide, shallow bowl.
At once, pour hot dressing over them; mix, then push leaves to 1 side of the bowl.

948101.title: Greek -Style Lamb Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 500g lamb fillets, marinated in Safeway 1 lb For $5.99 thru 02/09
500g Sebago/ new potatoes, quartered King Sooper's 5 lb For $1.88 thru 02/09
3 tomatoes, cut into wedges Safeway 1 lb For $1.29 thru 02/09
instruction_list: Heat frypan; add lamb fillets and cook for 5 minutes until browned.
Rest for 5 minutes, then slice into chunks.
Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender; drain.
Combine with onion, olives, cucumber, tomato and sliced lamb.
Drizzle with mayonnaise and scatter with mint leaves.

624197.title: California Baked Potato with Salad
ingredient_list: 4 medium baked potatoes, cut into spears
1/2 cup ATHENOS Crumbled Reduced Fat Feta Cheese
1/2 cup KRAFT Lite Raspberry Vinaigrette Dressing
instruction_list: Toss potato spears with dressing.
Place on baking sheet.
Sprinkle with garlic powder and parsley.
Bake at 375F for 20 min.
or until crispy.
Divide among 4 plates.
Build side salad with lettuce, cranberries, feta cheese, walnuts and dressing; toss.
Divide evenly among the 4 plates.
Serve an 8 fl oz glass of milk per person with the meal.

1028223.title: Creamy Red Potato & Egg Salad
ingredient_list: 2 env. GOOD SEASONS Italian Dressing Mix
6 cups sliced cooked red potatoes (about 1-1/2 lb.) King Sooper's 5 lb For $1.88 thru 02/09
1/4 cup chopped onion King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09
instruction_list: Mix mayo, milk and salad dressing mixes in large bowl until well blended.
Add remaining ingredients; mix lightly to coat.
Refrigerate 3 hours or until ready to serve.

185414.title: Southwest Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 7-1/2 qt. red potatoes, unpeeled, cut into wedges
1-1/4 cups OSCAR MAYER Real Bacon Recipe Pieces
instruction_list: Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender; drain.
Mix mayonnaise, barbecue sauce, vegetables, bacon and seasonings in large bowl.
Add potatoes; toss lightly.
Cover.
Refrigerate several hours or until chilled.

417170.title: Potato and Yam Salad
ingredient_list: 1 lb yukon gold potato, peeled and quartered
4 ounces garnet yams, peeled and cut into same size as quartered Yukon potatoes
14 cup red cabbage, very finely chopped
14 cup ham, finely diced (for vegetarians, leave the ham out)
1 teaspoon fresh tarragon, finely chopped or 1 teaspoon dried tarragon
instruction_list: Place the Yukon potatoes into a saucepan and cover with cold water (leave enough room for the yam).
Add 1 teaspoon sea salt and bring to a boil.
Add Garnet yam (all the potatoes and yam should still be covered by the water) into the saucepan.
Reduce heat and simmer for 15 20 minutes or until done.
While simmering the potatoes and yam, chop all the veggies, ham and tarragon.
Drain the potatoes and yam.
Mash them all together in a large bowl.
Add mayonnaise, ground black pepper and all finely chopped ingredients into the same bowl.
Stir until even.
Add more sea salt or pepper, if desired.
Let the salad stay in the fridge for a couple of hours before serving.

213088.title: Danish Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 2 pounds Potatoes, Use Small Firm Potatoes Like Fingerlings Or Yukon Gold
6 whole Radishes, Stems Removed, Finely Sliced
5 spears Asparagus, Tough End Removed Then Chopped
1/2 whole Red Bell Pepper, Stem And Seeds Removed, Then Diced
1/2 pieces Green Bell Pepper, Stem And Seeds Removed Then Diced
16 ounces, fluid Sour Cream Or Creme Fraiche
1/4 teaspoons Salt And Pepper, to taste
instruction_list: Place the potatoes in a large pot of cold water.
Bring the water to a boil and add the salt, then lower the heat and simmer for 15-18 minutes, until the potatoes are tender when pierced with a knife.
Cook time will vary based on the size of the potatoes.
They should be fork tender.
Its important to start with the potatoes in cold water, this will prevent overcooking the outside of the potatoes before they are done.
Drain the potatoes and rinse in cold water.
Peel the potatoes, and set aside in the refrigerator to cool completely.
Mix all the ingredients for the dressing in a large bowl, and set refrigerate until ready.
Wash and slice/dice the vegetables.
Slice the cold potatoes.
Add potatoes and vegetables into the bowl of dressing and toss gently to mix it all in the dressing.
Store the potato salad in the refrigerator until you are ready to serve it.
Enjoy!

858012.title: Potato Salad
instruction_list: Put cooked potatoes and blanched vegetables with the celery and bell pepper in a large bowl.
In a blender, combine oil, lemon juice, sugar, garlic, tabasco sauce, coconut, parsley, salt and pepper and blend for a few seconds until smooth.
Pour over the vegetables and gently toss until they are well coated.
Chill in the refrigerator.

54306.title: Classic Potato Salad
instruction_list: Boil peeled potatoes in salted water until done.
Cool to room temperature.
Place diced potatoes in large bowl.
Mix mayonnaise, cider vinegar, sugar, mustard, salt, garlic powder, and pepper in another bowl.
Add to potatoes.
Add celery and onions and mix well.
Stir in eggs.
Sprinkle a little paprika on top.

124025.title: My Momma's Potato Salad (With My Personal Touch:)
instruction_list: partially peel potatoes & boil in a large pot of salted water until soft, drain & let cool (Ii 1/2ll sometimes throw them in a bowl in the freezer to speed up this process.
bring eggs to a rolling boil, cover & remove from heat.
let stand, covered, for 15 minutes.
drain & let cold water run over until cool.
peel & dice pretty small.
dice potatoes into 1 inch cubes & put in a large serving bowl.
layer remaining ingredients on top of potatoes in the order written.
After spreading everything evenly over the potatoes, gently combine all ingredients with a wooden spoon.
i 1/2you only want to stir once so the potatoes doni 1/2t break up too much.
cover & refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
remove from fridge & add more mayo if necessary.
(potatoes will soak up some of the mayo while chilling.

209258.title: Aunt Eleanor's Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 1 pickle, finely chopped or 2 tablespoons pickle relish
instruction_list: In a large saucepan of cold water add potatoes.
Bring to a boil and cook just until tender.
Drain and cool.
Cut potatoes into 1-inch pieces.
In a separate pan add eggs to cold water and bring to a boil.
Simmer for about 10 minutes.
Drain and cool eggs under cold running water.
Peel eggs and mash with a fork.
Add mayonnaise, mustard, celery, pickle or relish and vinegar.
Stir well to combine.
Pour dressing over potatoes and toss to coat.
Season to taste with paprika and salt.
Refrigerate until cool before serving.

328816.title: Sauerkraut Potato Salad Recipe
instruction_list: Combine sauerkraut, potatoes, and Large eggs.
Toss lightly.
Add in remaining ingredients and toss lightly and chill.
You may also add in diced onions or possibly peppers or possibly celery.

148754.title: Julie's Crunchy Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 12 large red potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices
2 green bell peppers, seeded and diced
1 pinch salad seasoning mix (such as McCormick Salad Supreme Seasoning), or to taste
1 pinch dill seasoning mix, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons pickle juice, or to taste
instruction_list: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes.
Drain, cool, and cut potatoes into bite-size pieces.
Combine celery, green onion, carrots, bell peppers, and olives, in a large bowl.
Stir mashed eggs, mayonnaise, mustard, pickles, salad seasoning mix, and dill seasoning in another bowl; season with salt and pepper.
Stir egg mixture and potatoes into vegetable mixture.
Add pickle juice and mix until creamy.

820733.title: Best Ever Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 1 cup oil (salad, canola, whatever you generally use)
instruction_list: In a bowl, combine oil, vinegar, onion, salt, basil, mustard & pepper & mix well.
When potatoes are tender, but not mushy, drain, place in large bowl & pour this marinade over them.
Toss gently until absorbed.
Gently stir in eggs & vegetables.
Mix mayonnaise & milk together & fold into the potato mixture.
Chill several hours before serving.
Note: I cube my potatoes before they go into the pot to boil.
They cook faster & I don't have to cube hot potatoes!
Just watch them, because you don't want them mushy!
"Cooking Time" is chilling time,.

765681.title: Tarragon Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 3 medium leeks (about 1 1/2 pounds), white and tender green parts, quartered lengthwise and thinly sliced
instruction_list: Put the potatoes in a large pot of cold water.
Bring to a boil and cook over moderate heat until tender, 20 to 25 minutes.
Drain and let cool under running water.
Peel the potatoes and cut them into 1/2-inch chunks.
In a large skillet, heat the olive oil until shimmering.
Add the leeks and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until tender but not browned, about 5 minutes.
Let the leeks cool completely.
In a large bowl, whisk the mayonnaise with the mustard and vinegar until smooth.
Add the sauteed leeks, celery, tarragon and chives and season with salt and pepper.
Gently fold in the potatoes until coated.
Serve the potato salad chilled or at room temperature.

84628.title: Cajun Caper Potato Salad
ingredient_list: 12 cup Dijon mustard or 12 cup yellow mustard
instruction_list: Get large pot of cold salted water (a tbsp or two is fine) and put on high heat with diced potatoes and eggs inside.
Once water comes to a boil set a timer for 5 minutes.
Take eggs out and let cool in a bowl after timer goes off.
When eggs are cooled dice.
Continue to cook potatoes until they are tender, then drain.
Combine all ingredients, taste and season.
If you're refrigerating the salt may mellow as it is refrigerated.
Found that out when I thought I'd overseasoned once.
Salting the potatoes during cooking prevents too much salt change.

26516.title: Artichoke, Orzo and Sun-Dried Tomato Salad
ingredient_list: 34 cup sun-dried tomato, chopped (use the oil-packed)
3 tablespoons kalamata olives, pitted and chopped
1 (15 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, chopped (reserve the liquid for the dressing)
instruction_list: Cook orzo according to package directions.
Rinse and set aside.
In a large bowl, toss orzo, spinach, sun-dried tomatoes, onion olives and artichoke.
Pour 1/2 of the artichoke liquid over the salad, season with salt and pepper, toss again.
(You can add more liquid to taste.
Sprinkle feta over salad and lightly toss.
Serve and enjoy!

940561.title: Russian Tomato Salad
instruction_list: In a medium bowl, toss together sweet onions, tomatoes, and green bell peppers.
Blend sour cream and dill in a small bowl.
Lightly toss into the salad mixture.
Cover, and chill in the refrigerator until serving.

717344.title: Corn, Tomato and Scallion Salad
instruction_list: Saute corn in hot olive oil, adding salt and pepper to taste, until tender.
Add garlic and saute until garlic becomes aromatic, less than 1 minute.
Deglaze with vinegar and stock, cooking until liquid is nearly evaporated (au sec) Add tomatoes and cook 1 minute more.
Remove from heat, stir in scallions.
Cool, season with salt and pepper, serve at room temperature.

357025.title: Tomato Salad
ingredient_list: 1 1/2 pounds juicy tomatoes, cut into wedges
instruction_list: Mix all ingredients in a salad bowl.
Toss gently and season with salt and pepper.
Serve at room temperature family style.

368750.title: Baked Chicken Milanese with Arugula & Tomato Salad
ingredient_list: 2 pounds Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts, Pounded Thin
instruction_list: Preheat oven to 400F.
Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray and set aside.
Combine panko breadcrumbs and regular breadcrumbs in a shallow dish, then crack eggs into a separate dish and beat until smooth.
Dip each piece of chicken in egg wash, then into breadcrumbs.
Lay out on baking sheet in a single layer and bake for 20-25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and breadcrumbs are browning.
While chicken is cooking, combined arugula, tomatoes, and juice from one lemon.
Remove chicken from oven, transfer to a serving dish and top with arugula salad.
Use remaining lemon slices as garnish on each plate.
Enjoy!

244737.title: Grilled Cheese & Tomato Sandwich with a Salad
ingredient_list: 2 tsp. trans fat free canola-based soft margarine
2 slices KRAFT 2% Milk Singles Target 2 For $5.00 thru 02/06
1/2 carrot, grated Target 2 lb For $3.00 thru 02/06
1 Tbsp. KRAFT Fat Free Ranch Dressing
1 medium apple King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.87 thru 02/09
instruction_list: Spread each slice of bread with 1 tsp.
